t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 8 hours ago - The company launched in 2005 in Dubai, United Arab Emirates and served multiple areas across the Middle East. On March 28, 2017, Amazon acquired Souq.com for $580 million. The company was re-branded as Amazon and its infrastructure was used to expand Amazon's online platform in the Middle East.

t: Amazon Brand Registry: Protect your brand in Italy
s: Start your brand's Amazon journey by enrolling it in Amazon Brand Registry for free. After enrolling, you'll be able to unlock a suite of brand-building tools and obtain various protection benefits. You can enrol your brand even if you don't sell in an Amazon store.

t: Come creare le basi per il tuo brand | Amazon Ads
s: February 11, 2022 - I clienti non vedono l'ora di scoprire e acquistare da brand che riflettono le loro esigenze, i loro desideri e i loro valori. Desiderano che il proprio stile di vita e identità si rispecchino nelle scelte di acquisto che compiono, nei prodotti di un brand e nella sua filosofia e identità visiva.
